definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: They want to breake our will to resist by various promises and assurances.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望利用五花八门的许诺和保证瓦解我们的抵抗。

sentences.english: Its elements are as disparate as his sentences.
sentences.chinese: 它的要素五花八门，和他的文句一样。

sentences.english: They can ill afford the multifarious expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他们无力承担这些五花八门的开支。

sentences.english: They type in all kinds of things, all kinds of needs.
sentences.chinese: 五花八门的问题，各式各样的需求。

sentences.english: So it is quite a cross cut of students in the class.
sentences.chinese: 班里的学生可谓五花八门。

sentences.english: The non-standard usage of function words in legislative wording is varied.
sentences.chinese: 立法语言虚词使用不规范现象五花八门。

definition: more and more emerge/innumerable succession/breeding like flies (idiom)
names of many kinds (idiom); items of every description
by no means an isolated case/numerous
all kinds of/all sorts of/every (different) kind of
glittering jewels to delight the eye (idiom)/fig. a dazzling lineup
everything that should be here is here (idiom); all one can think of is on hand/to have all one needs
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
many and varied/of many different kinds
virtually the same/differing only on small points
